kridanganaye siti daru dariyange suwa duk wimasa balamin owun samanga katha kirimata da janadhipathithuma amathaka kale natha.oonama sanwardhana praweshayan sarthaka wimata nam gramiya janathawage awashyathawayan aamanthranaya kirima awashyayenma sidu kala yuthu bawath janathawata sanwardhanaya srujuwa gena yame di palath palanaya itha kriyakariwa katayuthu kala yuthu bawath mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma prakasha karanu labuwe ugandawe kampala nuwara pawathi 2013 podu rajya mandaliya palath palana samuluwe pradhana deshanaya pawathwamini.ehidi thawaduratath adahas dakwu janadhipathithuma dashaka 3 k thisse shri lankawa thrasthawadi kriya nisa gramiya saha nagarika thalayange sanwardhanaya adala wu aakaraya da pahadili karanu labuweya.

uda wu sinhala demala aluth awurudde hisathel game charithraya adata yedi thibenawa.ada perawaru 7.16 ta dakunu dishawa bala, hisata nugapath da, payata karandapath da thaba, nil pahathi wasthrabharanayen sarasi nuga mishra nanu da, thel da ga snanaya sidukarana lesayi nakath charithrawala dakwenne.esema, hisathel game rajya uthsawaya janadhipathi gotabhaya rajapaksha ha agamathi mahinda rajapakshage pradhanathwayen paliyagoda - widyalankara maha piriwenedi pawathwimata ada (17) niyamithawa thibenawa.me athara, hiru madhya jalaya mewara hisathel game charithraya itu karanne nawagamuwa purana paththini dewala pudabime sitayi.ema thorathuru hiru ti.wi. osse sajiwiwa wikashaya kirimata katayuthu yoda thibenawa.
